basics.name: Manuel Kloster
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: I am a Fullstack developer with an orientation to Backend and certified C2 level English. I am experienced with NodeJS (Express), Postgres (Sequelize), MongoDB, React and Redux. I have worked in five projects, mostly as a Node developer. I am Web 3.0 enthusiast!

work.name: NodeJS Backend developer / PERN Fullstack
work.summary: Developed a restaurant app that features: admin user type; ordering menu; printable orders; item search and filtering. Techs used were: Node.js, Express, JSON Web Token, MongoDB, MongoDB Atlas Database and Railway. Repository: https://github.com/Nekrocow/NoCountry-ChimekYoonRestaurantApp
highlights: App designed for ecuatorian client Chimek Yoon.

work.name: NodeJS Backend developer
work.summary: Working as part of a team of 7, developed StayUp, an app for recreational group activities coordination. Also organized Trello and Scrum workflow and presented the project on Demo Day. Features include: guest, registered and admin user types; shop and user reviews; QA to shop owners; chat; shop registration, deletion, modification, sorting, searching and filtering. Techs used on Back end: PostgreSQL, NodeJS (Express), JWT, AWS.Repository: https://github.com/Nekrocow/NoCountry-StayUp
highlights: 'Best Projects at No Country' award (2022). https://tinyurl.com/best-projects-award.

work.name: Team Leader
work.summary: Assisted teams in the development process of their projects. Scheduled and coordinated followup meetings. Facilitated communication between team members.

certificates.name: EF SET C2 english level Certificate
